unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi on 23/07/2024 is crucial for building a strong talent pipeline. We aim to recruit bright minds from premier institutions. Focus on identifying candidates with strong analytical skills and cultural fit. Shortlist applications by 10/08/2024, interviews scheduled for 15/08/2024 at 14:00 hrs. This year, we're offering Rs. 8 LPA starting. Looking forward to engaging with future leaders! Best of luck to all applicants.
normalised: Campus hiring at I I T Delhi on twenty third july two thousand and twenty four is crucial for building a strong talent pipeline. We aim to recruit bright minds from premier institutions. Focus on identifying candidates with strong analytical skills and cultural fit.
